extensionDescription.message: Seamlessly integrate pCloud with your Chrome browser for easy file management.

options_description.message: Configure your pCloud Chrome Extension settings here.

options_default_folder_label.description: Label for the current selected path display.

options_default_folder_placeholder.description: Placeholder for the default upload folder ID input.

options_save_button_text.description: Text for the save options button.

options_saved_message.description: Message displayed after settings are saved.

options_invalid_folder_id.message: Invalid folder ID. Please enter a non-negative number.
options_invalid_folder_id.description: Error message for invalid folder ID input.

login_token_prompt.description: Prompt for the token login view.

login_oauth_button.description: Text for the OAuth login button.

login_oauth_error.description: Generic error message for OAuth login failure.

login_error_empty_credentials.message: Please enter both email/username and password.
login_error_empty_credentials.description: Error message for empty login fields.

login_error_invalid_credentials.message: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

login_token_description.message: Log in to my.pcloud.com in another tab, then paste the 'auth' token here.
login_token_description.description: Description for how to get the auth token.

login_token_placeholder.description: Placeholder for the auth token textarea.

login_token_button_text.description: Text for the token login button.

login_switch_to_token.message: Or, log in with an auth token
login_switch_to_token.description: Link to switch to token login.

login_switch_to_password.message: Or, log in with email and password
login_switch_to_password.description: Link to switch to password login.

login_error_invalid_token.message: Invalid token. Please check the token and try again.
login_error_invalid_token.description: Error message for an invalid auth token.

login_error_generic.message: An unexpected error occurred during verification. Please try again.
login_error_generic.description: Generic error message for token verification.

upload_drag_and_drop_prompt.message: Drag & drop files here to upload
upload_drag_and_drop_prompt.description: Text for the drag and drop area.

upload_select_file_link.description: Link text to open file selector as an alternative to drag and drop.

upload_error_no_auth.message: Authentication error. Please log in again.
upload_error_no_auth.description: Error message when not authenticated for upload.

upload_error_no_file.message: Please select a file to upload.
upload_error_no_file.description: Error message when no file is selected for upload.

options_section_appearance.description: Header for the appearance settings section on the options page.

options_section_uploads.description: Header for the upload settings section on the options page.

snackbar_dismiss.description: Text for the dismiss button on a snackbar notification.

options_loading_folders.description: Message shown while the folder tree is loading.

options_login_to_load.message: Please log in via the extension popup to load folders.
options_login_to_load.description: Message shown when the user needs to log in to see folders.

options_error_loading_folders.message: Error loading folders. Please ensure you are logged in and have an internet connection.
options_error_loading_folders.description: Message shown when the folder tree fails to load.

context_menu_save_image.description: Context menu item text for saving an image.

notification_upload_started_title.description: Title for the notification when image upload starts.

notification_upload_started_message.description: Message for the notification when image upload starts.

notification_upload_success_title.description: Title for the notification when image upload is successful.

notification_upload_success_message.description: Message for the notification when image upload is successful.

notification_upload_error_title.description: Title for the notification when image upload fails.

notification_upload_error_message.message: Could not save image to pCloud. Please try again.
notification_upload_error_message.description: Message for the notification when image upload fails.

notification_auth_error_message.message: Please log in to the pCloud extension to save files.
notification_auth_error_message.description: Message for the notification when the user is not logged in.

options_section_filename.description: Header for the image filename settings section on the options page.

options_section_text_filename.description: Header for the text filename settings section on the options page.

options_filename_description.message: Drag and drop to reorder filename parts. Uncheck to exclude.
options_filename_description.description: Description for the filename configuration UI.

options_filename_part_sorting_number.description: Label for the 'Sorting Number' filename part.

options_filename_part_page_title.description: Label for the 'Page Title' filename part.

options_filename_part_free_key.description: Label for the 'Custom Text' filename part.

options_filename_separator_label.description: Label for the separator input field between filename parts.

contextMenuItemUploadSelection.description: Context menu item text for uploading selected text.

notificationUploadTextStartedTitle.description: Title for the notification when text upload starts.

notificationUploadTextStartedMessage.message: Saving selected text to your pCloud...
notificationUploadTextStartedMessage.description: Message for the notification when text upload starts.

notificationUploadTextSuccessTitle.description: Title for the notification when text upload is successful.

notificationUploadTextSuccessMessage.message: Selected text successfully saved to pCloud.
notificationUploadTextSuccessMessage.description: Message for the notification when text upload is successful.

notificationUploadTextErrorTitle.description: Title for the notification when text upload fails.

notificationUploadTextErrorMessage.message: Could not save selected text to pCloud. Please try again.
notificationUploadTextErrorMessage.description: Message for the notification when text upload fails.

notification_error_stale_content_script.message: Cannot connect to the page. Please reload the tab and try again.
notification_error_stale_content_script.description: Error message when the content script is outdated or not available.

context_menu_save_selection.message: Save Selection as Document to pCloud

notification_document_error_message.message: Could not save document. Please try again.

error_connection_lost_refresh.message: Cannot connect to the page. Please reload the tab and try again.
error_connection_lost_refresh.description: Error message when the content script is outdated or not available.

options_domain_rules_help_dialog_content.message: Rules are matched from top to bottom. The first matching rule will be applied. You can drag and drop to reorder rules. We recommend using the 'Test Playground' above to verify your configuration.

options_domain_rules_confirm_delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?

options_premium_description.message: Unlock advanced features like Document Downloader (Markdown/Word) and more!

options_tier_pcloud_desc.message: Unlocks features for this extension only.

options_tier_master_desc.message: Unlocks ALL HyperFetch extensions (pCloud, S3, etc.).

options_premium_active_desc.message: You have access to all premium features.

options_restore_failed.message: No license found for this email.

notification_premium_required_message.message: This feature requires a Premium license. Upgrade now to unlock!

pdf_error_not_pdf.message: This page is not a PDF.

visit_official_website.description: Link text to the official product website.
